rukus.text: 26|177|On goh ki Suajʙ ʙa onon guft: «Ojo [az Alloh taolo] parvo namekuned
26|178|Ba rosti, man ʙaroi sumo pajomʙare amin hastam
26|179|Pas, az Alloh taolo parvo kuned [ʙitarsed] va mutei [dasturhoi] man ʙosed»
26|180|Va man [dar ʙaroʙari risolatam] hec podose az sumo namexoham. Podosi man tanho ʙar [uhdai] Parvardigori cahonijon ast
26|183|Va koloi mardumro kam nadihed [va haqqasonro zoe' nakuned] va dar zamin ʙa fasod [va taʙohi] nakused
26|184|Va az kase, ki sumo va ummathoi pesinro ofarid, parvo kuned [ʙitarsed]
26|185|Onon guftand: «[Ej Suajʙ] Cuz in nest, ki tu codusudai
26|186|Tu cuz ʙasare hammonandi mo nesti va mo turo duruƣgu mepindorem
26|187|Pas, agar rost megui, porae az osmonro ʙar [sari] mo ʙiandoz»
26|188|[Suajʙ] Guft: «Parvardigoram ʙa on ci mekuned, donotar ast»
26|189|Pas, uro duruƣgu angostand va azoʙi ruzi aʙr [-i otasʙor] ononro faro girift. Ba rosti, ki on [ʙoroni otas] azoʙi ruzi havlnoke ʙud
26|190|Be gumon, dar in [mocaro] nisonae [ʙaroi iʙrat giriftan] ast; va ʙestarason mu'min naʙudand
26|191|Va ʙe tardid, Parvardigorat hamon sikastnopaziri mehruʙon ast
